scripts.say: ... In the last episode, Histy threw Blanc and the others for a loop yesterday.
And now in today's exciting installment - a new Mirror Sea has spawned!
For them to appear back-to-back like this... how unusual.
This would probably be the first time this has happened, right?
This is also an effect of my Protagonist Aura! Let's go mop up some quests and farm some rare ships!
Just what are you rambling about? Neptune, our priority is to investigate the Mirror Sea. The only things we should be mopping up are our clones, got it?
Loosen up, Noire, I know~â™ª After all, the commander here is sure to burn all their fuel farming this Mirror Sea. Right, Laffey?
Wait, shouldn't you be taking the commander's side?
Ah... our commander isn't like that... Though there are some who not only burn all their fuel, but also run everyone's morale into red...
I can see a bleak future of overwork ahead of us... I'm asking to be paid for overtime...
Jeez, I'm surrounded by black-hearted people.
Even though Noire has the most black heart here~
The color just suits me well! I'm not black-hearted at all!
Now now, everyone, let's not be so serious. It'll ruin your cute faces. Let's lighten up, shall we?
... Go home, Vert, you're drunk.
Don't wanna~ Being surrounded by all these cute girls... this is the heaven I wanted... ehehe... (Squeeze!)
Awawa?! Vert, what are you doing all of a sudden?
Urk... so this is the strength... of a carrier's embrace...
Vert, you're just like Neptune. Whether in war or peace, you two never change.
Come on, everyone. Let's all strengthen our teamwork and head out to the new Mirror Sea!
